prompts:
✅ Frontend Implementation Complete

  The frontend now includes:

  1. State Management (Lines 153-160)

  - isCreatingOnboardingUser - Loading state for user creation
  - onboardingUserStatus - Status/result of user creation
  - isUpdatingOnboarding - Loading state for record update
  - onboardingUpdateStatus - Status/result of record update
  - onboardingUserEmail - User email input
  - onboardingUserName - User name input
  - onboardingUserPassword - Optional password input

  2. Handler Functions (Lines 780-871)

  - generateDefaultPassword() - Generates password following "Restaurantname789!" convention
  - handleCreateOnboardingUser() - Creates new onboarding user via API
  - handleUpdateOnboardingRecord() - Updates onboarding record via API

  3. UI Components (Lines 3960-4065)

  The Onboarding User Management card includes:
  - Input fields for user name, email, and optional password
  - Auto-generated password preview when password field is empty
  - Two action buttons:
    - "Create Onboarding User" - Creates the user account
    - "Update Onboarding Record" - Updates the database record
  - Status displays showing success/error messages
  - Loading states with spinner animations
  - Form validation (buttons disabled when required fields are empty)

  4. Features

  - ✅ Database icon import fixed
  - ✅ All necessary components imported
  - ✅ API integration ready for backend endpoints
  - ✅ Password auto-generation following convention
  - ✅ Error handling with toast notifications
  - ✅ Success/failure status displays
  - ✅ Loading states for better UX

  The frontend is now ready and waiting for the backend implementation of:
  - /registration/create-onboarding-user endpoint
  - /registration/update-onboarding-record endpoint
Please ensure that there are no processes running on ports 3007 or 5007, then restart the server using npm start
The system tried to use the admin password and email for the user account instead of the information from the form input
The form on the frontend should auto populate with the name and email from the database restaurants table using the columns contact_name and contact_email [Image #1]
This system is now working but the organisation name is being added as the organisation of the user on the extractor app which isn't correct for the actual restaurant so it should be left blank
I notice this is also trying to get the stripe connect url from the pumpd_accounts table but it's actually supposed to come from the restaurants table
Now we need to add all of the new api endpoints from this automation project to the bottom of server.js to log them on startup. There are many endpoints we've not added to the logs

I think you might have missed some of the new routes:\
/api/registration/generate-code-injections\
/api/registration/configure-website
